/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly yellow and white, standing tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen in the distance, driving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, showcasing the vibrant city life in Beijing.
